definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: McDonald's and KFC use this kind of international business strategy to make their profit.
sentences.chinese: 麦当劳和肯得及就是利用这种国际化策略来盈利的。

sentences.english: As noted, most of the internationalization code is not reliably implemented yet.
sentences.chinese: 据说，大部分国际化代码还没有被可靠地实现。

sentences.english: Providing dynamic internationalization of information for display is a difficult problem.
sentences.chinese: 为显示提供信息的动态国际化是一个难题。

sentences.english: Its economy is increasingly market-oriented and internationalised.
sentences.chinese: 中国的经济逐渐的以市场为导向，并且国际化。

sentences.english: Then we generalized the strenth of China in connecting with the international supply chain.
sentences.chinese: 建立国际化供应链成为他们向国际化进军的必然选择。

sentences.english: Then we generalized the strenth of China in connecting with the international supply chain.
sentences.chinese: 建立国际化供应链成为他们向国际化进军的必然选择。

sentences.english: The internationalization of the food science and technology periodicals is irreversible.
sentences.chinese: 食品类科技期刊国际化是时代发展不可逆转的潮流。

sentences.english: It is a great honor to me to join this world-wide big event.
sentences.chinese: 参加这个国际化的大型盛事，是给予我的荣誉。

sentences.english: Very few organisations have a truly international structure and perspective.
sentences.chinese: 极少数组织拥有真正国际化的结构和眼界。

sentences.english: W2:New York is the best city.  It’s the most international city in the world.
sentences.chinese: 纽约最好，它是世界上最国际化的都市。

sentences.english: Singapore in manpower training to request international recruitment and only will apply.
sentences.chinese: 在人才培育上，新加坡是国际化求才，唯才适用。

sentences.english: The essence of accounting internationalization is to strive for profits.
sentences.chinese: 会计国际化的本质是利益之争。

sentences.english: In this case, the labels are not yet internationalized.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，标签都尚未国际化。

sentences.english: The above defines one i18n message.
sentences.chinese: 上面的示例定义了一条国际化消息。

sentences.english: The concept of multi-culture has become a global tendency.
sentences.chinese: 多元文化已经成为一种国际化趋势。

sentences.english: Does your international work involve pupils of different ages?
sentences.chinese: 贵校的国际化建设是否了年龄段的学生？

definition: to create/to build/to develop/to forge (of metal)
railtrack connection/to integrate into sth/to dock/to connect/to be in step with/to bring into line with/to align
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
